CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Hagop,

As discussed, the NIO ET5 insurance certificate will be shared either this evening or tomorrow. The insurance rates will be confirmed later. 

@Kevin Chalhoub <mailto:Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>  Could you confirm if this arrangement works for you?

In the meantime, please provide Liva Insurance with the required documents as mentioned below so they can prepare a quotation for us: 

*	Last 3 years’ loss report from GIG
*	Fleet details



Best regards,
Jackie Merchant
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
Building 6, The Greenhouse
Dubai Design District
Dubai, UAE
